titleInfo.title: Order of the Court to Sheriff of White County, to Take Orphans in Custody

subject.topic: Lane, Jacob A.; Blane, A.; Fisk, M.; Shoemaker, Catharine; Shoemaker, John; Shoemaker, Elizabeth; Shoemaker, Hannah.

mods.note: A court order issued by Jacob A. Lane, Clerk of White County Court, through his Deputy A. Blane. The order instructs Sheriff M. Fisk to bring in the orphans Catharine, John, Elizabeth and Hannah Shoemaker, who are "in a state of suffering," to be "dealt by as the court may think fit." There is a note on the back in which Fisk replies that the children were not found.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
